Become Donut Boy

An accident at the local donut factory has caused a scattering of donuts all throuhgout town. Become donut boy and travel to exotic locations in order to rescue the lost stock.

Also, save your coworkers. Since you're heading out anyway.

Donut Boy

Coworkers

Travel to Excotic Locations

  • The Beach
  • A Bakery
  • A Fish Factory?
  • Your Grandmother's Basement
  • Staten Island

Beat the Baddies

There will be many innocent animals slightly inconvenincing you on your mission.
You must destroy them for their malfeasance.

Baddies

Rat

  • Likes to party
  • Doesn't exercise
▸
Rat Likes to Party Doesn't exercise
Bat Afraid of the dark Never finished high school
Spider Kind of gross Youtube channel never took off
Clam Hates the beach Afraid to move inland
Crab Can be too polite sometimes Delicious when steamed
Seagull On the Keto diet since 2014 Constant existential dread
Dust Big into K-Pop Has an Asian fetish
Fish Generally apathetic Kind of a dick
Fat Man lmaooo what was I thinking lmao
Zombie Insatiable craving for flesh Apartment is surprisingly tidy
Ghost Very spooky Just wants a hug / emotional wreck
Toaster Resents consciousness Warranty is expired
Baker Inherited parents bakery Gluten allergy
